text: We are looking for ambitious engineers to join our team to help us make it better, and we are backed by investors behind Uber, Airbnb and Spotify that believe in our vision, so we can build “the opposite” of HR software, something that is made for and loved by employees. Are you interested in learning more? Please send me you resume if you are an awesome product designer (3 + years exp) or a flutter developer (3 + years exp).
Looking for a HubSpot Developer familiar with custom themes that could help with some global field theme setup (specifically fonts).
Whats up Todd, still looking for some UI/UX work?
